statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={5.2}, \displaystyle{b}={8.7}, \displaystyle{c}={11.8}, and \displaystyle{d}={14.9} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={103}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
